definition: to comprehend (new things) by analogy
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
kind/type/class/category/similar/like/to resemble
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: In this way, when can we judge the whole ancient books to read, comprehend by analogy.
sentences.chinese: 这样，阅读古书时才能举一反三，触类旁通。

sentences.english: If you understand this point, you can understand the rest by analogy.
sentences.chinese: 如果懂得这点，其它的就可以触类旁通了。

sentences.english: Finally, choose partial target system to make case analysis in order to understand by analogy.
sentences.chinese: 选择了部分指标体系进行了案例分析，以求触类旁通。

sentences.english: However, painting and music to some extent can also be comprehended similarly.
sentences.chinese: 然而绘画与音乐在某种程度上又是触类旁通的。

definition: to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
grasp this fundamental point and all the rest will follow (idiom)
to raise one and infer three/to deduce many things from one case (idiom)
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
lit. to hear one and know ten (idiom); fig. explain one thing and (he) understands everything/a word to the wise
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
a hint is all that is needed/understanding each other without the need to explain
to get a better grasp of sth
comprehension/perception/feeling
to understand/to comprehend
self-taught/to learn without a teacher (idiom)
with familiarity you learn the trick (idiom); practice makes perfect
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
related.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: erudite/widely read and knowledgeable
refined/profound
proficient (in sth)/to understand sth through and through
